newsitem.title: UK: British Energy January 97 sales rise.
newsitem.headline: British Energy January 97 sales rise.

text.p: British Energy Plc said on Tuesday that its total sales reached 6.24 Terawatt hours (TWh) in January, 1997 from 5.84 TWh a year ago.
A Terawatt hour is the largest unit of measurement for electricity sales, representing one billion kilowatt hours.
